import React, {useEffect, useState } from "react"; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import { ContactService } from "../../../services/ContactService"; let ContactList = () => { let [state , setState] = useState({ loading : false, contacts : [], errorMessage : '' }); useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { const data = await ContactService.getAllContacts(); } fetchData() .catch(console.error); }, []) return (

) }; export default ContactList;
